title: Focus on Ethiopia
brief_description: A survey of the growth of Ethiopia since the war. Scenes are given of new building, educational and agricultural programs which are now under way. The recent history of the country is traced from the beginning of the 20th century, including newsreel sequences of the Italo-Ethiopian war. Under the leadership of Emperor Haile Selassie the country is being prepared to take an important place in world affairs.
